title: Trends Rights Activist 6/16: Beyonce, 'Blonde', NBA Finals, Anna's Streaming Corner
itunes:title: Trends Rights Activist 6/16: Beyonce, 'Blonde', NBA Finals, Anna's Streaming Corner
description:
In this edition of Trends Rights Activist, Jack and super producer Anna Hossnieh discuss Beyonce dropping a new album, Anna's favorite things, the trailer for the NC-17 rated Marilyn Monroe biopic 'Blonde', and the NBA Finals!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
